summary: An alien spaceship is being sought by various factions on Earth. A female cyborg and a rogue trader team up to stop evil forces from taking over the ship.
cast: Tracy Davis|Hans Bachmann|Michael Mack|Ron Ikejiri|Rick Foucheux|James Hild|Reggie Vaughn|Judith Z. Miller|Charles Lunsford|Rick Sabatini|Norman Gagnon|Philip Fidandis|Michael Genebach|Richard Lee Rutherford|Gary Cooper|Angela Judy|Jon Trapnell|Victoria Eves|Wayne Keyser|John R. Ellis
keywords: female cyborg|outer space|space fight|brain implant|independent film
director: Director: Philip J. Cook (as Philip Cook)
title: Más allá de la luna
